statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={159.2}{e}^{{{0.0225}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0225}}\approx{1.0227550341644}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0227550341644}-{1}={0.022755034164446}\approx{0.0228} and the percent is 2.28.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
